statements: UPDATE ImageRecognitionData SET confidence_level = 0.9 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ImageRecognitionData SET facial_features = '{"eyes": 1, "nose": 0, "mouth": 0}' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE ImageRecognitionData SET facial_features = '{"eye_color": "brown", "hair_color": "black"}', confidence_level = 0.85 WHERE id = 101
UPDATE ImageRecognitionData SET image_url = 'https://example.com/image123.jpg', facial_features = '{"eye_color": "blue", "hair_color": "blonde"}', confidence_level = 0.95 WHERE confidence_level > 0.9
UPDATE facial_recognition_data SET recognition_result = '{"status": "success"}', image_path = '/images/updated_image.jpg' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE facial_recognition_logs SET timestamp = '2022-01-10 09:30:00', action = 'Face Recognized' WHERE log_id = 5;
UPDATE facial_recognition_data SET recognition_result = '{"match": true}' WHERE id = 123
UPDATE facial_recognition_logs SET timestamp = NOW(), action = 'Processed update' WHERE user_id = 456
UPDATE image_data SET image_path = '/path/to/new/image.jpg' WHERE image_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE facial_features SET feature_data = '{"eyes": true, "nose": true, "mouth": false}' WHERE face_id = 'abcdef12-3456-7890-bcde-123456789abc';
UPDATE image_data SET image_path = '/images/new_image.png' WHERE image_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE facial_features SET feature_data = '{"eyes": 1, "nose": 1, "mouth": 0}' WHERE face_id = 'abcdef12-3456-7890-abcd-ef1234567890';
UPDATE ImageData SET image_name = 'New Image Name' WHERE image_id = 1;
UPDATE FaceRecognition SET recognition_result = 'Verified' WHERE face_id = 3;
UPDATE ImageData SET image_name='Updated Image 1' WHERE image_id=1;
UPDATE FaceRecognition SET recognition_result='Recognized' WHERE face_id=5;
UPDATE ImageData SET image_data = 'new_data' WHERE image_id = 1;
UPDATE ImageData SET image_id = 2, image_data = 'updated_data' WHERE image_id = 3;
UPDATE ImageData SET image_data = 'updated image data' WHERE image_id = 1;
UPDATE ImageData SET image_id = 2, image_data = E'\xDEADBEEF' WHERE image_id = 3;
